panels.description:
Namespace free memory ((memory_free_pct / 100) * memory_size) in bytes

Namespace total memory (memory_size) in bytes
panels.title: Namespace Memory Statistics

panels.description:
Namespace free disk space ((device_free_pct / 100) * device_total_bytes)

Namespace device total size in bytes

Namespace device available space in bytes ((device_available_pct/100) * device_total_bytes)

Namespace free pmem space ((pmem_free_pct / 100) * pmem_total_bytes)

Namespace pmem total size in bytes

Namespace pmem available space in bytes ((pmem_available_pct/100) * pmem_total_bytes)
panels.title: Namespace Storage Statistics

panels.description: Percentage of device space used by primary index (for flash and PMEM)
panels.title: % Primary Index Device Used (Flash/PMEM)

panels.description:
Namespace index flash usage in bytes

Namespace index PMEM usage in bytes
panels.title: Namespace Index (Flash/PMEM) Statistics

panels.description:
Shows per-second average rate of increase in

1. Total reads = client_read_success + client_read_error + client_read_timeout + client_read_not_found
2. Successful reads = client_read_success
3. Errored reads = clean_read_error
4. Timedout reads = client_read_timeout
5. Not found = client_read_not_found

targets.expr: rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_success{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_timeout{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_not_found{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])

panels.title: Client Reads (TPS)

panels.description:
Shows per-second average rate of increase in

1. Total writes = client_write_success + client_write_error + client_write_timeout
2. Successful writes = client_write_success
3. Errored writes = clean_write_error
4. Timedout writes = client_write_timeout

targets.expr: rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_success{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_timeout{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])

panels.title: Client Writes (TPS)

panels.description: Shows per-second average rate of increase in batch_sub_read_success, batch_sub_read_not_found, batch_sub_read_error and batch_sub_read_timeout
panels.title: Batch Sub Reads

panels.description:
Shows per-second average rate of increase in

1. Total (_complete + _error) scans
2. Successful (_complete) scans
3. Errored (_error) scans
4. Aborted (_abort) scans

It includes all 4 types of scans -  scan_basic, scan_aggr, scan_udf_bg, and scan_ops_bg and rate is computed over the last minute.

targets.expr:
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_aggr_complete{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_basic_complete{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_udf_bg_complete{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_ops_bg_complete{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_udf_bg_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_aggr_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_basic_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_ops_bg_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])

rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_aggr_complete{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_basic_complete{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_udf_bg_complete{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_ops_bg_complete{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])

rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_udf_bg_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_aggr_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_basic_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_ops_bg_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])

rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_aggr_abort{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_basic_abort{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_udf_bg_abort{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_scan_ops_bg_abort{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])

panels.title: Scans (TPS)

panels.description:
Shows per-second average rate of increase in

1. Total (query_reqs),
2. Successful (query_reqs - query_fail),
3. Error (query_fail)
panels.title: Queries (TPS)

panels.description:
Shows per-second average rate of increase in 

1. Total = client_udf_complete + client_udf_timeout + client_udf_error
2. Successful = client_udf_complete
3. Error = client_udf_error
4. Timeout = client_udf_timeout

targets.expr:
rate(aerospike_namespace_client_udf_complete{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_client_udf_timeout{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+
rate(aerospike_namespace_client_udf_error{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])

panels.title: UDFs (TPS)

panels.description: Namespace fail_generation (Errors due to generation mismatch), fail_key_busy (Hotkey errors), fail_record_too_big (Errors due to record being more that write block size), fail_xdr_forbidden (Forbidden errors due to XDR configs for incoming XDR traffic)
panels.title: Failure Rate

panels.description: Namespace memory_free_pct (available namespace memory percentage), high_water_memory_pct (memory high water mark), stop_writes_pct (stop writes threshold)
panels.title: Memory Info %

panels.description: Namespace memory_used_bytes (memory_used_data_bytes (Data) + memory_used_index_bytes (Primary Index) + memory_used_sindex_bytes (Secondary Index))
panels.title: Memory Used

targets.expr: aerospike_namespace_memory_size{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} - aerospike_namespace_memory_used_bytes{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}

panels.description: Namespace storage free percentage (device_free_pct or pmem_free_pct)
panels.title: Storage Free %

panels.description: Namespace storage usage in bytes (device_used_bytes or pmem_used_bytes)
panels.title: Storage Used

panels.description: Namespace storage free bytes (device_total_bytes - device_used_bytes or pmem_total_bytes - pmem_used_bytes)

targets.expr: aerospike_namespace_device_total_bytes{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} - aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}

aerospike_namespace_pmem_total_bytes{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} - aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="aerospike", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}

panels.title: Storage Free
